name: ackee
description: Ackee is an open-source, self-hosted web analytics tool built with Node.js and MongoDB, designed for privacy-conscious users. Unlike many mainstream analytics platforms, it does not rely on tracking cookies or unique user identifiers and puts your data firmly in your own control. It provides a clean, minimal dashboard interface to monitor key metrics (like page views, referrers, session durations) and supports a fully documented GraphQL API for custom integrations.
features: Privacy-Focused: Cookieless tracking respects visitor privacy, no personal data collection. Ethical analytics done right.
Anonymous Metrics: Aggregate data without identifying individual users. Insights without invasion.
Clean Dashboard: Elegant interface displays key metrics at a glance. Understand your traffic instantly.
Essential Tracking: Monitor page views, referrers, and session duration. All the data you actually need.
GraphQL API: Powerful API for custom integrations and advanced reporting. Extend functionality as needed.
Data Ownership: All analytics stored on your own server infrastructure. Complete control guaranteed.
Reliable Stack: Built on Node.js and MongoDB for consistent performance. Stable and dependable.
GDPR Compliant: Fully meets privacy regulations worldwide. No legal concerns.
